title: Chemistry Quiz
quizMessage: Test your chemistry knowledge with this quiz!

questions.question: What is dissociation?
options: It is the process of a substance changing from a liquid to a gas.
It is the process of a substance changing from a solid to a liquid.
It is the breaking up of a compound into simpler constituents.
It is the process of combining two or more substances to form a new compound.
questions.answer: It is the breaking up of a compound into simpler constituents.

questions.question: What is the general formula for a dissociation reaction?
Intermolecular collisions may also ionize gases at _______ temperatures.
